Literature.Title: Identification and Functional Characterization of Peptides With Antimicrobial Activity From the Syphilis Spirochete, Treponema pallidum.
Literature.Author: Houston S, Schovanek E, Conway KME, Mustafa S, Gomez A, Ramaswamy R, Haimour A, Boulanger MJ, Reynolds LA, Cameron CE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 9723H(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 10148(no activity data),Salmonella enterica SL 1344(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538P(no activity data),Streptococcus pyogenes(no activity data),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=0.3-1.3µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MBC=1.3µM),Neisseria gonorrhoeae ATCC 700825(no activity data)
